name: Mariachi Legends
description:
You are Pablo Cruz, a Mexican detective chosen by Lady Death herself to take on the greatest case of her career: Find the powerful amulet that could undermine her power over the Kingdom of the Dead and disrupt the celebration of Muertos Day. Armed with La Sombra's mighty weapon and a mariachi suit endowed with supernatural powers, it's time for you to descend into the underworld and confront the mariachi legends and their minions-before it's too late!

Combining side-scroller gameplay and vibrant Mexican culture, Mariachi Legends is a unique experience. Responsive, fast-paced combat combines with platforming, exploration, and plenty of quirky, old-school violence for a good cause. Not to mention the fact that death is not a defeat, but a stepping stone to Cruz's ultimate mission.
